name: So Wrong, yet so Wright
description: The curious case of Australian computer scientist Dr. Craig Wright, self-proclaimed creator of the original Bitcoin blockchain and a loud proponent that he is in fact Satoshi Nakamoto. Whether or not it is true, what is true is he is not one bit afraid to be loud and relentless about his beliefs on where Bitcoin is headed and what it needs to become.
collection_description: SuperRare makes it easy to create, sell, and collect rare digital art. SuperRare's smart contract platform allows artists to release limited-edition digital artwork tracked on the blockchain, making the pieces rare, verified, and collectible. Filter the crypto art world's best selling works by artist name, creation type, and year of birth on OpenSea.
